QuestData.Title: Renn McGill
QuestData.Description: From the wording of the orders you recovered, it looks like the first priority of the Defias will be to locate and secure whatever cargo they possessed.$B$BSI:7 has had a salvage diver named Renn McGill working out of Theramore for some time. When he heard about the shipwreck, Renn went north to dive near the islands the Defias now occupy.$B$BIf we're to beat the Defias to this cargo, we'll need his help. Look for him in the waters northeast of a small island just north of the island you visited earlier.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Defias Orders to Renn McGill in the waters off the Dreadmurk Shore.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well met, $c. What brings you out here?
QuestData.RewardText: <Renn looks over the orders.>$B$BSo there was valuable cargo on board! We have to locate it before the Defias recover it. These guys are no divers, but we're going to need some of their gear if you're to help me find the cargo.
